byline.contributor: Zahra Nader and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The determination of Abdul Basir to kill his 22-year-old son is a sign of how Afghanistan’s violence has poisoned the closest of relationships.

headline.print_headline: Afghan Officer Targets  His Son: ‘I Will Kill Him’
headline.main: ‘I Will Kill Him’: Afghan Commander Targets Son, a Taliban Fighter

snippet: The determination of Abdul Basir to kill his 22-year-old son is a sign of how Afghanistan’s violence has poisoned the closest of relationships.
abstract: Afghan commander Abdul Basir hunts to kill his own son Said Muhammad, who is member of Taliban, offering sign of how ongoing violence there is poisoning family relationships.
